    • CompositeCondition

      @Deprecated public CompositeCondition(CompositeCondition.Operator operator, List<? extends Condition> conditions)
      Deprecated.
      Use Cope.and(List) or Cope.or(List) instead
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if conditions==null
      IllegalArgumentException - if conditions.size()==0

      Deprecated.
      Use Cope.and(Condition[]) or Cope.or(Condition[]) instead
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if conditions==null
      IllegalArgumentException - if conditions.length==0
